name: 2D Heart Of America
description:
HEART OF AMERICA, THIS IS THE CHIEF OF POLICE! The Germans are invading New Merica', it's up to YOU to stop them with YOUR trusty American-Made 1911 Pistol!

Controls:

WASD/ARROWS - Movement

CLICK/SPACE - Shoot

Trailer:

Detective Heart of America is a Series/Movie created by FilmCow, it was just so good we had to make a game on it.

- Made in collaboration with FoulestLad96 & GrymGryffin.
